title: Document Management System
description: Comprehensive document lifecycle management with organization, versioning, and collaboration
overview: The Document Management System (DMS) provides secure, organized storage and retrieval of legal documents. Built specifically for legal practice needs, it ensures document integrity, version control, and easy access for case preparation and client service.

keyFeatures.title: Smart Organization
keyFeatures.description: Hierarchical folder structure with intelligent categorization
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Organize GST notices, replies, evidence by case and stage

keyFeatures.title: Version Control
keyFeatures.description: Track document versions with complete change history
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Maintain audit trail for GST reply drafts and submissions

keyFeatures.title: Template Management
keyFeatures.description: Pre-built legal document templates for faster drafting
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: GST-specific templates for appeals, representations, and replies

keyFeatures.title: Collaboration Tools
keyFeatures.description: Real-time collaboration with team members and clients
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Share draft documents with clients for review and approval

keyFeatures.title: Search & Discovery
keyFeatures.description: Advanced search across content, metadata, and tags
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Quickly find precedents, similar cases, and reference materials

keyFeatures.title: Security & Compliance
keyFeatures.description: Role-based access control and audit trails
keyFeatures.gstRelevance: Protect sensitive client and case information
